title: "Can't Sleep? Group Therapy is Being Offered at the Psychology Clinic"
excerpt: "The Psychological Clinic at the U of A is offering group therapy for anyone having difficulty falling or staying asleep. The group will meet Wednesdays from 5:30-6:30 p.m. beginning in September."
